system_metadata.system_description: Complete ecological system with wolf predation - demonstrates healthy trophic cascade
system_metadata.test_purpose: Reference system showing complete ecosystem with all trophic levels intact

vegetation_ecosystem.name: Vegetation Ecosystem System
vegetation_ecosystem.status: HEALTHY - Regenerating due to reduced browsing

trophic_cascade.description: Classic example of top-down ecosystem regulation
trophic_cascade.cascade_flow: Wolves → Deer behavior → Vegetation regeneration → Beaver recovery → Wetland creation → Biodiversity increase
trophic_cascade.yellowstone_parallel: Mirrors wolf reintroduction effects in Yellowstone National Park (1995-present)
